org.apache.juneau.rest.mock

Class MockServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.mock.MockServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse, MockHttpResponse

    public class MockServletResponse
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, MockHttpResponse
    An implementation of HttpServletResponse for mocking purposes.
    See Also:
    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > Serverless Unit Testing

                                       throws AssertionError

        Parameters:

      • assertBodyMatches

        public MockServletResponse assertBodyMatches(String pattern)
                                      throws AssertionError
        Throws an AssertionError if the response body does not match the specified pattern.

        A pattern is a simple string containing "*" to represent zero or more arbitrary characters.

        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern to match against.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
        Throws:
        AssertionError - Thrown if the body does not match the specified pattern.

      • assertBodyMatchesRE

        public MockServletResponse assertBodyMatchesRE(String regExp)
                                        throws AssertionError
        Throws an AssertionError if the response body does not match the specified regular expression.

        A pattern is a simple string containing "*" to represent zero or more arbitrary characters.

        Parameters:
        regExp - The regular expression to match against.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
        Throws:
        AssertionError - Thrown if the body does not match the specified regular expression.
